LanguageData.RD_AlertExplanation: A nitralope has become dangerously bloated. You must relieve the pressure by milking it, or it may explode!
LanguageData.RD_DiplomacyAwful: The flailing diplomatic "strategy" of {0} seemed chiefly to involve wild swings between aggression and panic, peppered liberally with lewd insults involving the negotiator for {1}'s antecedents. Your already strained relations have, understandably, worsened ({2} to relations).
LanguageData.RD_DiplomacyExcellent: {0}'s easy, but unyielding manner dealt well with a number of the negotiator for {1}'s concerns. Your relations have improved by {2}
LanguageData.RD_DiplomacyMasterWorkLegendary: {0} made diplomacy look as easy as breathing, with an almost magical ability to make {1}'s negotiator see your perspective. Your relations have undergone a substantial improvement of {2}.
LanguageData.RD_DiplomacyNormalGood: {0}'s negotiation adequately dealt with some minor disputes you have with {1}. Your relations have improved by {2}.
LanguageData.RD_DiplomacyPoor: The chief negotiation tactic employed by {0} seemed to be staring bored at the wall. This did little to diffuse tensions and engender a feeling of respect ({2} to relations))
LanguageData.RD_FilesPertanentLuciferiumCure: There seem to be files pertanent to a luciferium cure, but {0} lacks the intellectual skills to access them.
LanguageData.RD_FortunatelyDissipateAttack: Fortunately, {PAWN_nameDef} was able to dissipate the attack with their psychic capabilities.
LanguageData.RD_FortunatelyDissipateAttackShock: {PAWN_nameDef} was able to channel the attack, preventing harm to others, but is now in psychic shock!
LanguageData.RD_GoldenFoilPacket: A small, golden foil packet drops out of a nearby hatch!
LanguageData.RD_GratefulSurvivorsAmazedDesc: The survivors of the crash are amazed by your rapid and professional emergency medical response, thanks to which no-one died. In gratitude, they have included a special system removed form the wreck.
LanguageData.RD_GratefulSurvivorsDesc: The survivors of the crash are very thankful for your help, and have send some supplies as a gesture of gratitude.
LanguageData.RD_MalevolentPsychicDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} believes that a malevolent psychic energy is massing, and that this peaceful herd of muffalo are on the brink of a mass insanity.
LanguageData.RD_MechanitesCureCorrupted: The mechanites in the cure have corrupted their programming and escaped their packaging!
LanguageData.RD_MiscarriedRadiation: {PAWN_nameDef} has miscarried due to radiation poisoning.
LanguageData.RD_NewFactionDesc: The survivors of the crash have decided to make a life for themselves here, and have founded a new faction
LanguageData.RD_OnlyPsychicCanBroadcast: Only psychic pawns can broadcast a battle prayer
LanguageData.RD_OtherGateBuried: The other gate has been buried! We cannot transit!
LanguageData.RD_PlantDiedRatiation: A plant has died due to radiation damage
LanguageData.RD_PsionicLandmine: A psionic landmine in the room generates a short-range psychic shock!
LanguageData.RD_ReceivedVisionBattle: {PAWN_nameDef} has received visions accompanying the drone, showing a battle and crying out for help. Others must have noticed, so the site will probably be dangerous.
LanguageData.RD_ShootingStar: just saw something fall from the sky near here!
LanguageData.RD_StargateNoEvidence: There is no evidence of a stargate there.
LanguageData.RD_StargateNotLinked: Stargate is not linked to a destination!
LanguageData.RD_TeleporterLannotLockThickRock: Teleporter cannot lock on through the thick rock overhead!
LanguageData.RD_ThinksResearchDubious: \n{PAWN_nameDef} thinks that the research is dubious, and is concerned that any remaining samples will be dangerous.
LanguageData.RD_ThinksScienceUnderlying: \n{PAWN_nameDef} thinks that the science underlying the project is sound, and though the process has been lost, any remaining samples of the cure probably work.
LanguageData.RD_YouCannotLock: You cannot lock onto anything there.
LanguageData.RD_YourCaravanSpottedMuffaloMigration: Your caravan has spotted a huge muffalo migration!
LanguageData.RD_LetterPawnsLostDueToMapCountdown: Some of your animals or prisoners were left behind in the wilderness:\n\n{0}
